# Libraries

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
```

# Data reading

```{r}
raw_data <- fread("encuesta_calidad_vida.csv") %>% 
  as_tibble()
```

# NA cleaning

```{r}
data_na <- raw_data %>%
  naniar::replace_with_na_all(~.x %in% c(common_na_numbers, common_na_strings))

data_88 <- data_na %>% 
  na_if(-88) %>% 
  na_if(-98) %>% 
  na_if(-97) %>% 
  na_if(-77)

data_88 %>% 
  fwrite("data_88.csv", sep = ";")
```
